task.summary: Add dual construct for Monoids. The dual construct arises from the fact that you have a choice between the order that you combine things in op. a1 then a2 or a2 then a1, both satisfy the monoid laws. The dual method constructs the dual of a given monoid by by flipping the 'op'.

Exercise 10.9
Had help, but used the more efficient forall method

Exercise 10.13 and 14
The OptionFoldable could have been implemented using only matches but I wanted to try variety

Chapter 12 .2
The set of primitives (map2 and unit) is equivalently expressive as the set of (apply and unit)

Chapter 12 .6
Overrode map2 to ensure proper propogation of errors

Chapter 12 .12
Basically implemented traverse but specialized
